tasks.task_description: Integrate Amazon Bedrock for advanced foundation models
Add Amazon SageMaker for custom ML endpoints
Implement Amazon Textract for document processing
Add Amazon Personalize for intelligent recommendations
Integrate Amazon Kendra for smart healthcare search
Deploy enhanced AI features and test performance

description: Enhance AI Features & Performance with advanced AWS AI/ML services for superior healthcare intelligence
context: Enhanced AI services integrated: Amazon Bedrock for foundation models, SageMaker for custom ML predictions, Textract for document analysis, Personalize for intelligent recommendations, and Kendra for smart healthcare search. All endpoints added with comprehensive healthcare-specific functionality.

Enhanced AI features deployed successfully. New task started and registered with load balancer. Application running with enhanced AWS AI services including Bedrock, SageMaker, Textract, Personalize, and Kendra. Deployment in progress with 2 running tasks during transition.
